committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to revise certain procedures relating to the sale of uranium by the Secretary of Energy.

summary.text: Uranium Sales Procedures Act of 1984 - Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to change the procedures for sales of uranium to prohibit: (1) surcharges on the exercise of variable tails assay option using source material of domestic origin under sales contracts upon a specified determination of nonviability; and (2) source material owned by the Federal Government from being used in providing certain services unless such material is valued in a specified manner.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to revise certain procedures relating to the sale of uranium by the Secretary of Energy.
